tool_description: Whether its SMS marketing, or cold-call central. You need to ensure your time, money and various other resources are spent wisely.  This API will allow you to check the type of phone you input, such as Mobile, Landline, Toll-Free etc.  It runs via two different verification methods to ensure the best results.
title: Phone Scrubber

api_list.name: Number Verification
api_list.description: This endpoint will be called to gather information on the given phone number in the given location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-scrubber.p.rapidapi.com/{region}/{phone_number}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-scrubber.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
